name: Fate Loom Weavers
description:
This is a turn-based game about the end of all (not just the world)and how some people try to survive in a ship, before the nothingness eat the ship and them, it will have a ton of characters (even if it has just 5 characters developed right now) to choose from, many worlds to explore, and a battle system in wich every character will have their own and unique skill and battle form.

This is the (very) early beta, just has the Prologue and the First chapter, and still doesn't have all mechanichs implemented, I'm working in the game alone, but I need funds and help, I'm doing fine working alone in the game, but eventually I will need help from other people (for example: Musicians, graphic designers, maybe voice actors, etc.). And even if I do this for fun, I understand that not everyone would do this just for fun.

Credits to:

Team VisuStella

* Yanfly

* Arisu

* Olivia

* Irina

If at least one of you is seeing this:

Thanks for the code/picture/sprite/sound/etc. that you has done.
